subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Despite finishing 71st in the 2014 Ryder Cup standings and missing the cut at the P.G.A., Tiger Woods is still being considered for the American Ryder Cup team.
snippet: Despite finishing 71st in the 2014 Ryder Cup standings and missing the cut at the P.G.A., Tiger Woods is still being considered for the American Ryder Cup team.
